TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CommandField extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase

summary.span: Represents a special field that displays command buttons to perform selecting, editing, inserting, or deleting operations in a data-bound control.

span.span: Represents a special field that displays command buttons to perform selecting, editing, inserting, or deleting operations in a data-bound control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是由数据绑定控件使用的特殊字段 (如和) 若要显示执行 delete 命令按钮，编辑、 插入或选择操作。The class is a special field used by data-bound controls (such as and ) to display command buttons that perform delete, edit, insert, or select operations. 要执行这些操作的命令按钮可以是显示还是隐藏使用下表中显示的属性。The command buttons to perform these operations can be shown or hidden using the properties shown in the following table. |属性Property|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||显示或隐藏中的删除按钮字段在数据绑定控件中每个记录。Shows or hides a Delete button in a field for each record in the data-bound control. 删除按钮允许用户从数据源中删除记录。The Delete button allows the user to delete a record from the data source.| ||显示或隐藏在编辑按钮字段在数据绑定控件中每个记录。Shows or hides an Edit button in a field for each record in the data-bound control. 编辑按钮允许用户编辑数据源的记录。The Edit button allows the user to edit a record from the data source. 当用户单击特定的记录，编辑的编辑按钮按钮将替换更新按钮和取消按钮。When the user clicks the Edit button for a specific record, that Edit button is replaced with an Update button and a Cancel button. 所有其他命令按钮都将隐藏。All other command buttons are also hidden.| ||显示或隐藏在新建按钮字段。Shows or hides the New button in a field. 新建按钮允许用户在数据源中插入新记录。The New button allows the user to insert a new record in the data source. 当用户单击新建按钮时，它会替换插入按钮和取消按钮。When the user clicks the New button, it is replaced with an Insert button and a Cancel button. 所有其他命令按钮都将隐藏。All other command buttons are also hidden. **注意：** 此属性仅适用于支持插入操作，如数据绑定控件控件。**Note:** This property applies only to data-bound controls that support inserting operations, such as the control.| ||显示或隐藏中的选择按钮字段在数据绑定控件中每个记录。Shows or hides a Select button in a field for each record in the data-bound control. 选择按钮允许用户在数据绑定控件中选择一条记录。The Select button allows the user to select a record in the data-bound control.| 此外，按钮显示一条记录中编辑时或插入模式取消可显示或隐藏通过设置属性。In addition, the Cancel button displayed when a record is in edit or insert mode can be shown or hidden by setting the property. > [!NOTE] > 与数据源控件结合使用的数据绑定控件时 (如控件)，数据绑定控件可以充分利用数据源控件的功能并提供自动删除、 更新和插入功能。When a data-bound control is used in combination with a data source control (such as a control), the data-bound control can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities and provide automatic delete, update, and insert functionality. 对于其他数据源，你需要提供在数据绑定控件的相应事件过程中执行这些操作的例程。For other data sources, you need to provide the routines to perform these operations during the appropriate events for the data-bound control. 根据使用它的数据绑定控件以不同方式显示字段。The field is displayed differently depending on the data-bound control in which it is used. 例如，控制显示字段作为列，而控件将其显示为一行。For example, the control displays a field as a column, while the control displays it as a row. 若要指定要显示的按钮的类型，使用属性。To specify the type of button to display, use the property. 当属性设置为`ButtonType.Button`或`ButtonType.Link`，你可以指定要通过设置以下表所示的属性显示的按钮的文本。When the property is set to `ButtonType.Button` or `ButtonType.Link`, you can specify the text to display for the buttons by setting the properties shown in the following table. |属性Property|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||取消按钮的标题。The caption for the Cancel button.| ||删除按钮标题。The caption for the Delete button.| ||编辑按钮标题。The caption for the Edit button.| ||插入按钮标题。The caption for the Insert button. **注意：** 此属性仅适用于支持插入操作，例如数据绑定控件控件。**Note:** This property applies only to data-bound controls that support insert operations, such as the control.| ||新按钮的标题。The caption for the New button. **注意：** 此属性仅适用于支持插入操作，例如数据绑定控件控件。**Note:** This property applies only to data-bound controls that support insert operations, such as the control.| ||选择按钮的标题。The caption for the Select button.| ||更新按钮的标题。The caption for the Update button.| 而不是显示的命令按钮或链接按钮，您可以通过设置来显示图像按钮属性`ButtonType.Image`，然后设置以下表所示的属性。Instead of displaying a command button or a link button, you can display an image button by setting the property to `ButtonType.Image` and then setting the properties shown in the following table. |属性Property|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||要显示取消按钮的图像The image to display for the Cancel button| ||要显示的删除按钮的图像。The image to display for the Delete button.| ||要显示的编辑按钮的图像。The image to display for the Edit button.| ||要显示的插入按钮的图像。The image to display for the Insert button. **注意：** 此属性仅适用于支持插入操作，例如数据绑定控件控件。**Note:** This property applies only to data-bound controls that support insert operations, such as the control.| ||要显示新按钮的图像。The image to display for the New button. **注意：** 此属性仅适用于支持插入操作，例如数据绑定控件控件。**Note:** This property applies only to data-bound controls that support insert operations, such as the control.| ||要显示的选择按钮的图像。The image to display for the Select button.| ||要显示的更新按钮的图像。The image to display for the Update button.| 默认情况下，当用户单击中的按钮字段中，在该页上的所有验证控件上执行验证。By default, when the user clicks a button in a field, validation is performed on all validation controls on the page. 若要禁止在单击按钮时进行验证，请设置属性`false`。To prevent validation from occurring when a button is clicked, set the property to `false`. 可以隐藏字段通过设置数据绑定控件中属性`false`。You can hide a field in a data-bound control by setting the property to `false`. 字段允许你自定义其页眉和页脚部分。The field allows you to customize its header and footer sections. 若要在页眉或页脚部分中显示标题，请设置或属性，分别。To display a caption in the header or the footer section, set the or the property, respectively. 而不是在标头部分中显示文本，你可以通过设置内显示图像属性。Instead of displaying text in the header section, you can display an image by setting the property. 若要隐藏中的标头部分对象，设置属性`false`。To hide the header section in a object, set the property to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 某些数据绑定控件 (如控件) 可显示或隐藏控件的整个标头部分。Some data-bound controls (such as the control) can show or hide only the entire header section of the control. 这些数据绑定控件不支持单个按钮字段的属性。These data-bound controls do not support the property for an individual button field. 若要显示或隐藏的数据绑定控件的整个标头部分 （如果可用），请使用控件的`ShowHeader`属性。To show or hide the entire header section of a data-bound control (if available), use the control's `ShowHeader` property. 您还可以自定义的外观通过设置字段的不同部分的样式属性的对象 （如字体颜色、 背景色等）。You also can customize the appearance of the object (font color, background color, and so on) by setting the style properties for the different parts of the field. 下表列出不同的样式属性。The following table lists the different style properties. |样式属性Style property|描述Description| |--------------------|-----------------| ||子 Web 服务器控件的样式设置对象。The style settings for the child Web server controls of the object.| ||页脚部分的样式设置对象。The style settings for the footer section of the object.| ||标头部分的样式设置对象。The style settings for the header section of the object.| ||中的数据项的样式设置对象。The style settings for the data items in the object.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用字段来显示用来编辑中的记录控件控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use a field to display controls to edit a record in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[CommandField2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CommandField2/CS/commandfield2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CommandField2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CommandField2/VB/commandfield2vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用， ，和可自定义的文本编辑控件属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the , , and properties to customize the text for the editing controls. [!code-aspx-csharp[CommandField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CommandField/CS/commandfieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CommandField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CommandField/VB/commandfieldvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数初始化的新实例类。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 此构造函数通常用时将字段添加到的动态创建的数据绑定控件。This constructor is commonly used when adding fields to a dynamically created data-bound control. 动态地添加字段的数据绑定控件，创建一个新对象、 设置其属性，并将其添加到数据绑定控件的字段集合。To dynamically add a field to a data-bound control, create a new object, set its properties, and then add it to the data-bound control's field collection. 例如，如果你使用控件中，添加对象传递给集合。For example, if you are using the control, add the object to the collection. > [!NOTE] > 尽管动态可以将字段添加到数据绑定控件，但强烈建议该字段是静态声明，然后显示或隐藏，根据需要。Although you can dynamically add fields to a data-bound control, it is strongly recommended that fields be statically declared and then shown or hidden, as appropriate. 静态声明所有字段会减小父数据绑定控件的视图状态的大小。Statically declaring all your fields reduces the size of the view state for the parent data-bound control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此构造函数中动态添加字段列控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor to dynamically add a field column to a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[CommandFieldCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CommandFieldCtor/CS/commandfieldctorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CommandFieldCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CommandFieldCtor/VB/commandfieldctorvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: Gets or sets the URL to an image to display for the Cancel button in a field.

span.span: Gets or sets the URL to an image to display for the Cancel button in a field.

value.span: 若要显示有关中的取消按钮的图像 URL 。

span.span: The URL to an image to display for the Cancel button in a .

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性字段设置为`ButtonType.Image`，使用属性来指定要显示取消按钮的图像。When the property of a field is set to `ButtonType.Image`, use the property to specify the image to display for the Cancel button. 只要客户端的浏览器支持该格式，此映像可以是任何文件格式 （.jpg、.gif、.bmp、 等）。This image can be in any file format (.jpg, .gif, .bmp, and so on), as long as the client's browser supports that format. > [!NOTE] > 作为为取消按钮显示图像的替代方法，你可以通过第一个设置中显示文本属性`ButtonType.Button`或`ButtonType.Link`，然后设置属性。As an alternative to displaying an image for the Cancel button, you can display text by first setting the property to `ButtonType.Button` or `ButtonType.Link` and then setting the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定一个自定义映像，以显示中的取消按钮字段控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom image to display for a Cancel button in a field of a control. 属性必须设置为`ButtonType.Image`取消按钮可显示图像。The property must be set to `ButtonType.Image` for a Cancel button to display an image. [!code-aspx-csharp[CommandFieldEditImageUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CommandFieldEditImageUrl/CS/commandfieldeditimageurlcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CommandFieldEditImageUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CommandFieldEditImageUrl/VB/commandfieldeditimageurlvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: Gets or sets the caption for the Cancel button displayed in a field.

span.span: Gets or sets the caption for the Cancel button displayed in a field.

value.span: 中的取消按钮的标题。

span.span: The caption for the Cancel button in a .

value.span: 默认值为"取消"。

span.span: The default is "Cancel".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性字段设置为`ButtonType.Button`或`ButtonType.Link`，使用属性来指定要显示取消按钮的文本。When the property of a field is set to `ButtonType.Button` or `ButtonType.Link`, use the property to specify the text to display for the Cancel button. > [!NOTE] > 作为为取消按钮显示文本的替代方法，你可以通过第一个设置中显示图像属性`ButtonType.Image`，然后设置属性。As an alternative to displaying text for a Cancel button, you can display an image by first setting the property to `ButtonType.Image` and then setting the property. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定自定义标题中显示的取消按钮字段控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom caption for a Cancel button displayed in a field of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[CommandField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CommandField/CS/commandfieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CommandField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CommandField/VB/commandfieldvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether validation is performed when the user clicks a button in a field.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether validation is performed when the user clicks a button in a field.

value.span: 若要执行验证，当用户单击中的按钮字段; 否则为。

span.span: to perform validation when the user clicks a button in a field; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定中的按钮时是否执行验证单击字段。Use the property to specify whether validation is performed when a button in a field is clicked. 当此属性设置为`true`，默认情况下在页上的所有验证控件进行都验证。When this property is set to `true`, by default all validation controls on the page are validated. 若要限制到特定组的验证控件的验证，创建验证组，然后设置验证组名称的属性。To limit validation to only a certain group of validation controls, create a validation group and then set the property to the validation group's name. 验证组的详细信息，请参阅。For more information on validation groups, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以防止发生中的按钮时验证单击字段。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to prevent validation from occurring when a button in a field is clicked. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[CommandFieldCausesValidation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CommandFieldCausesValidation/CS/commandfieldcausesvalidationcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CommandFieldCausesValidation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CommandFieldCausesValidation/VB/commandfieldcausesvalidationvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性字段设置为`ButtonType.Image`，使用属性来指定要显示为删除按钮的图像。When the property of a field is set to `ButtonType.Image`, use the property to specify the image to display for a Delete button. 只要客户端的浏览器支持该格式，此映像可以是任何文件格式 （.jpg、.gif、.bmp、 等）。This image can be in any file format (.jpg, .gif, .bmp, and so on), as long as the client's browser supports that format. > [!NOTE] > 作为显示为删除按钮图像的替代方法，你可以通过第一个设置中显示文本属性`ButtonType.Button`或`ButtonType.Link`，然后设置属性。As an alternative to displaying an image for a Delete button, you can display text by first setting the property to `ButtonType.Button` or `ButtonType.Link` and then setting the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定一个自定义映像，以显示中的删除按钮字段控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom image to display for a Delete button in a field of a control. 属性必须设置为`ButtonType.Image`的删除按钮可显示图像。The property must be set to `ButtonType.Image` for the Delete button to display an image. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性字段设置为`ButtonType.Button`或`ButtonType.Link`，使用属性来指定要显示为删除按钮的文本。When the property of a field is set to `ButtonType.Button` or `ButtonType.Link`, use the property to specify the text to display for a Delete button. > [!NOTE] > 作为显示为删除按钮的文本的替代方法，你可以通过第一个设置中显示图像属性`ButtonType.Image`，然后设置属性。As an alternative to displaying text for a Delete button, you can display an image by first setting the property to `ButtonType.Image` and then setting the property. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定自定义标题显示在删除按钮字段控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom caption for a Delete button displayed in a field of a control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由实现-派生类型中添加文本和控件添加到的一个数据控件，使用表来显示用户界面 (UI) 对象。The method is implemented by -derived types to add text and controls to a object of a data control that uses tables to display a user interface (UI). 这些数据控件创建完整的表结构的行时控件的`CreateChildControls`调用方法。These data controls create the complete table structure row-by-row when the control's `CreateChildControls` method is called. 方法由调用`InitializeRow`数据方法控件如和。The method is called by the `InitializeRow` method of data controls such as and . 调用此方法在编写自定义数据绑定时控制使用对象来初始化与数据或控件的表结构的单元格。Call this method when you are writing a custom data-bound control that uses objects to initialize the cells of the table structure with data or controls. 实现此方法，在编写时-派生类。Implement this method when you are writing a -derived class.

summary.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a Cancel button is displayed in a field.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a Cancel button is displayed in a field.

value.span: 若要显示中的取消按钮; 否则为。

span.span: to display a Cancel button in a ; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性以指定是否在显示取消按钮对象。Use the property to specify whether the Cancel button is displayed in a object. 取消按钮可以显示在字段中编辑数据绑定控件中的相应记录时或插入模式。A Cancel button can be displayed in a field when the corresponding record in a data-bound control is in edit or insert mode. 取消按钮允许用户取消编辑或插入操作，并将记录返回到正常的显示模式。The Cancel button allows the user to cancel the edit or insert operation and returns the record to its normal display mode. 当属性字段设置为`ButtonType.Button`或`ButtonType.Link`，使用属性来指定要显示取消按钮的文本。When the property of a field is set to `ButtonType.Button` or `ButtonType.Link`, use the property to specify the text to display for a Cancel button. 或者，可以通过第一个设置显示映像属性`ButtonType.Image`，然后设置属性。Alternatively, you can display an image by first setting the property to `ButtonType.Image` and then setting the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来隐藏时的行中显示取消按钮控件处于编辑模式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to hide the Cancel button displayed when a row in a control is in edit mode. [!code-aspx-csharp[CommandFieldShowCancelButton#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CommandFieldShowCancelButton/CS/commandfieldshowcancelbuttoncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CommandFieldShowCancelButton#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CommandFieldShowCancelButton/VB/commandfieldshowcancelbuttonvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性以指定是否在显示删除按钮字段在数据源控件中每个记录。Use the property to specify whether a Delete button is displayed in a field for each record in the data-source control. 删除按钮，可从数据源中删除一条记录。The Delete button allows you to remove a record from the data source. > [!NOTE] > 与数据源控件结合使用的数据绑定控件时 (如控件)，数据绑定控件可以充分利用数据源控件的功能并提供自动删除功能。When a data-bound control is used in combination with a data source control (such as a control), the data-bound control can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities and provide automatic delete functionality. 对于其他数据源，您必须提供执行删除操作的相应事件期间的数据绑定控件的例程。For other data sources, you must provide the routines to perform the delete operation during the appropriate event for the data-bound control. 当属性字段设置为`ButtonType.Button`或`ButtonType.Link`，使用属性来指定要显示为删除按钮的文本。When the property of a field is set to `ButtonType.Button` or `ButtonType.Link`, use the property to specify the text to display for a Delete button. 或者，可以通过第一个设置显示映像属性`ButtonType.Image`，然后设置属性。Alternatively, you can display an image by first setting the property to `ButtonType.Image` and then setting the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来显示每个记录中的删除按钮控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display a Delete button for each record in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[CommandFieldShowDeleteButton#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CommandFieldShowDeleteButton/CS/commandfieldshowdeletebuttoncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CommandFieldShowDeleteButton#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CommandFieldShowDeleteButton/VB/commandfieldshowdeletebuttonvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性以指定是否在显示编辑按钮字段在数据源控件中每个记录。Use the property to specify whether an Edit button is displayed in the field for each record in the data-source control. 编辑按钮，可编辑的记录的值。The Edit button allows you to edit the values of a record. 当用户单击编辑按钮时，输入的控件显示为每个记录中的字段。When the user clicks an Edit button, input controls are displayed for each field in the record. 记录的编辑按钮替换为更新按钮和取消按钮，并为记录所有其他命令按钮处于隐藏状态。The Edit button for the record is replaced with an Update button and a Cancel button, and all other command buttons for the record are hidden. 单击更新按钮以数据源中的新值更新的记录，而单击取消按钮取消操作。Clicking the Update button updates the record with the new values in the data source, whereas clicking the Cancel button cancels the operation. > [!NOTE] > 与数据源控件结合使用的数据绑定控件时 (如控件)，数据绑定控件可以充分利用数据源控件的功能并提供自动更新功能。When a data-bound control is used in combination with a data source control (such as a control), the data-bound control can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities and provide automatic updating functionality. 对于其他数据源，您必须提供执行更新操作的相应事件期间的数据绑定控件的例程。For other data sources, you must provide the routines to perform the update operation during the appropriate event for the data-bound control. 当属性字段设置为`ButtonType.Button`或`ButtonType.Link`，使用属性来指定要显示为编辑按钮的文本。When the property of a field is set to `ButtonType.Button` or `ButtonType.Link`, use the property to specify the text to display for an Edit button. 或者，可以通过第一个设置显示映像属性`ButtonType.Image`，然后设置属性。Alternatively, you can display an image by first setting the property to `ButtonType.Image` and then setting the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性显示在每个记录一个编辑按钮控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display an Edit button for each record in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[CommandFieldEditImageUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CommandFieldEditImageUrl/CS/commandfieldeditimageurlcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CommandFieldEditImageUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CommandFieldEditImageUrl/VB/commandfieldeditimageurlvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a New button is displayed in a field.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a New button is displayed in a field.

value.span: 若要显示在一个新按钮; 否则为。

span.span: to display a New button in a ; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性以指定是否在显示新按钮字段。Use the property to specify whether a New button is displayed in a field. 新建按钮一次只能显示在字段，并允许用户在数据源中添加一条新记录。The New button is displayed only once in the field and allows the user to add a new record in the data source. > [!NOTE] > 此属性仅适用于支持插入操作，例如数据绑定控件控件。This property applies only to data-bound controls that support insert operations, such as the control. 当用户单击新建按钮时，输入的控件显示为每个字段显示在数据绑定控件中，允许用户输入新的记录的值。When the user clicks the New button, input controls are displayed for each field displayed in the data-bound control, allowing the user to enter the values for the new record. 新建按钮将替换插入按钮和取消按钮，和中的所有其他命令按钮隐藏字段。The New button is replaced with an Insert button and a Cancel button, and all other command buttons in the field are hidden. 单击插入按钮添加到数据源的记录，而单击取消按钮将取消该操作。Clicking the Insert button adds the record to the data source, whereas clicking the Cancel button cancels the operation. > [!NOTE] > 与数据源控件结合使用的数据绑定控件时 (如控件)，数据绑定控件可以充分利用数据源控件的功能并提供自动插入功能。When a data-bound control is used in combination with a data source control (such as a control), the data-bound control can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities and provide automatic insert functionality. 对于其他数据源，必须提供的数据绑定控件执行的相应事件期间插入操作的例程。For other data sources, you must provide the routines to perform the insert operation during the appropriate event for the data-bound control. 当属性字段设置为`ButtonType.Button`或`ButtonType.Link`，使用属性来指定要显示新按钮的文本。When the property of a field is set to `ButtonType.Button` or `ButtonType.Link`, use the property to specify the text to display for a New button. 或者，可以通过第一个设置显示映像属性`ButtonType.Image`，然后设置属性。Alternatively, you can display an image by first setting the property to `ButtonType.Image` and then setting the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性显示在一个新按钮控制，这样用户就可以将一条新记录添加到数据源。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display a New button in a control, which allows the user to add a new record to the data source. [!code-aspx-csharp[CommandFieldShowInsertButton#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CommandFieldShowInsertButton/CS/commandfieldshowinsertbuttoncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CommandFieldShowInsertButton#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CommandFieldShowInsertButton/VB/commandfieldshowinsertbuttonvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性以指定是否在显示选择按钮字段在数据源控件中每个记录。Use the property to specify whether a Select button is displayed in a field for each record in the data-source control. 选择按钮允许用户选择数据源控件中的一行。The Select button allows the user to select a row in the data-source control. 单击选择按钮的记录时，数据源控件做出相应响应。When the Select button for a record is clicked, the data-source control responds accordingly. 例如，控制更新， ， ，和到对应于所选行值的属性。For example, a control updates the , , , and properties to values corresponding to the selected row. 样式随后会应用于所选行和和引发事件。The style is then applied to the selected row and the and events are raised. 当属性字段设置为`ButtonType.Button`或`ButtonType.Link`，使用属性来指定要显示选择按钮的文本。When the property of a field is set to `ButtonType.Button` or `ButtonType.Link`, use the property to specify the text to display for a Select button. 或者，可以通过第一个设置显示映像属性`ButtonType.Image`，然后设置属性。Alternatively, you can display an image by first setting the property to `ButtonType.Image` and then setting the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性显示每个记录中选择按钮控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display a Select button for each record in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[CommandFieldShowSelectButton#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CommandFieldShowSelectButton/CS/commandfieldshowselectbuttoncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CommandFieldShowSelectButton#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CommandFieldShowSelectButton/VB/commandfieldshowselectbuttonvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The URL for an image to display for an Update button in a .

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置此属性。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性字段设置为`ButtonType.Image`，使用属性来指定要显示为更新按钮的图像。When the property of a field is set to `ButtonType.Image`, use the property to specify the image to display for an Update button. 只要客户端的浏览器支持该格式，此映像可以是任何文件格式 （.jpg、.gif、.bmp、 等）。This image can be in any file format (.jpg, .gif, .bmp, and so on), as long as the client's browser supports that format. > [!NOTE] > 作为显示为更新按钮图像的替代方法，你可以通过第一个设置中显示文本属性`ButtonType.Button`或`ButtonType.Link`，然后设置属性。As an alternative to displaying an image for an Update button, you can display text by first setting the property to `ButtonType.Button` or `ButtonType.Link` and then setting the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定一个自定义映像，以显示中的更新按钮字段控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom image to display for an Update button in a field of a control. 属性必须设置为`ButtonType.Image`为更新按钮可显示图像。The property must be set to `ButtonType.Image` for an Update button to display an image. [!code-aspx-csharp[CommandFieldEditImageUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CommandFieldEditImageUrl/CS/commandfieldeditimageurlcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CommandFieldEditImageUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CommandFieldEditImageUrl/VB/commandfieldeditimageurlvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性字段设置为`ButtonType.Button`或`ButtonType.Link`，使用属性来指定要显示在更新按钮的文本。When the property of a field is set to `ButtonType.Button` or `ButtonType.Link`, use the property to specify the text to display in an Update button. > [!NOTE] > 作为显示为更新按钮的文本的替代方法，你可以通过第一个设置中显示图像属性`ButtonType.Image`，然后设置属性。As an alternative to displaying text for an Update button, you can display an image by first setting the property to `ButtonType.Image` and then setting the property. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定自定义标题中显示的更新按钮字段控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom caption for an Update button displayed in a field of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[CommandField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CommandField/CS/commandfieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CommandField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CommandField/VB/commandfieldvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override void ValidateSupportsCallback ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void ValidateSupportsCallback() cil managed
Public Overrides Sub ValidateSupportsCallback ()
public: override void ValidateSupportsCallback();
override this.ValidateSupportsCallback : unit -> unit

summary.span: Determines whether the controls contained in a object support callbacks.

span.span: Determines whether the controls contained in a object support callbacks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是用于确定控件是否包含在一个帮助器方法对象支持回调。The method is a helper method used to determine whether the controls contained in a object support callbacks. 类不支持回调时显示选择按钮。The class does not support callbacks when the Select button is displayed. 实现此方法引发异常时显示选择按钮。This method has been implemented to throw a exception when the Select button is displayed. > [!NOTE] > 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。This method is used primarily by control developers.

exception.span: The Select button is displayed in the object.

span.span: The Select button is displayed in the object.

exception.span: The class does support callbacks when the Select button is displayed.

span.span: The class does support callbacks when the Select button is displayed.

span.para: 派生自的类类可以重写此方法，以指示是否通过字段支持回调所包含的控件。若要指示支持回调，实现此方法作为空方法不会引发异常;否则，抛出异常与描述为什么不支持回调的有用消息。

Classes that derive from the class can override this method to indicate whether the controls contained by the field support callbacks. To indicate that callbacks are supported, implement this method as an empty method that does not throw an exception; otherwise, throw an exception with a useful message describing why callbacks are not supported.
